name: Nebula Mining Corp.
description:
Welcome to Nebula Mining Corp. 

Your goal in this game is to collect asteroids and scrap to turn them into resources which you can sell for money. 

You can use this money to upgrade your ship and make you more effective at snatching those precious space rocks.

But be careful! You have a limited amount of energy and when it runs out, you will lose and die in the cold and merciless void of space… 

To prevent this rather unpleasent outcome you can buy some batteries. Those will come in very handy, trust me.

 Controls:

 To use your ships claws press leftclick on any ateroid in range. 

You can zoom in and out by using the mousewheel. Rightclick lets drag the camera around to change your point of view.

 To upgrade your ships modules just click on them.

 You can sell your resources by using the shop interface. To use a battery click the use button.
